  1. # coding: utf-8
  3. import re
  4. from django.forms.models import ModelForm
  5. from .models import GoogleMap
  6. from django.utils.translation import ugettext_lazy as _
  8. CSS_WIDTH_RE = re.compile(r'^\d+(?:px|%)$')
  9. CSS_HEIGHT_RE = re.compile(r'^\d+px$')
  12. class GoogleMapForm(ModelForm):
  13. class Meta:
  14. model = GoogleMap
  16. def clean(self):
  17. cleaned_data = super(GoogleMapForm, self).clean()
  18. width = cleaned_data.get('width', '')
  19. height = cleaned_data.get('height', '')
  20. if width or height:
  21. if width and not CSS_WIDTH_RE.match(width):
  22. self._errors['width'] = self.error_class([
  23. _(u'Must be a positive integer followed by “px” or “%”.')])
  24. if height and not CSS_HEIGHT_RE.match(height):
  25. self._errors['height'] = self.error_class([
  26. _(u'Must be a positive integer followed by “px”.')])
  27. return cleaned_data
